page.title: 08WESTCOTT TRADE
page.content: Westcott village has a sufficient number of shops, covering different goods. On one side of the street are {Westcott Newsagents, Balchins Store and{Debs Bakery.} Nobby Baker owns Westcott Newsagents, he sells{sweets, {toys and newspapers.} Cigarette blinds and shelves are provided for him by the cigarette manufacturers that advertise their brand. The shop started 74 years ago. Balchins Store sells groceries and has a{video {library.}Debs Bakery is a small shop run by the family. They bake their own{bread and cakes}and use a van to deliver goods. Across the road are two other shops. {Something Special,}is a{gift shop, run by Mr and Mrs Hyde. The Westcott{Antique}shop is where people can go in and buy or sell old second hand ornaments and furniture.
